```{r}
#| label: fig-foo
#| fig-cap: This is a figure caption.
#| echo: false

library(ggplot2)

ggplot() + 
  geom_segment(aes(x = 0, xend = 1, y = 0, yend = 1)) +
  lims(x = c(0, 1), y = c(0, 1)) + 
  theme(
    text = element_text(size = 20),
    axis.ticks = element_blank(),
    axis.text = element_blank()
  )
```
